wikipedia_page.main: Major-General  Geoffrey Grahame Rawson  (2 December 1887 – 14 January 1979) was a British Army officer who served in both the First and Second World Wars and had a notable cricket career, playing first-class cricket for the Army in 1921.

response: *Geoffrey Rawson – played for the British Army cricket team in 1921.Geoffrey Rawson at CricketArchive

link_mentions.page: Index of World War II articles (G)

response: *Major-General Geoffrey Rawson CB OBE MC (2 December 1887–14 January 1979)[1] was a senior British Army officer who served in both the First and Second World Wars and had a notable cricket career, playing first-class cricket for the Army in 1921.
